title: Sell Springbank

introParagraph: Springbank Distillery in Campbeltown produces three distinct whisky styles: Springbank, Longrow, and Hazelburn. All three are sought after by collectors. We buy these whiskies directly, including aged expressions and limited releases. Submit photos and details to receive an offer.

faqs.question: What Springbank expressions do you buy?
faqs.answer: We buy Springbank, Longrow, and Hazelburn expressions, focusing on aged and limited releases. Higher age statements and special releases like Local Barley are of particular interest.

faqs.question: What is the difference between Springbank, Longrow, and Hazelburn?
faqs.answer: All three are made at Springbank Distillery. Springbank is lightly peated, Longrow is heavily peated, and Hazelburn is unpeated. Each has distinct flavor profiles.

faqs.question: What are Local Barley releases?
faqs.answer: Springbank Local Barley releases use barley grown on specific local farms. These limited releases are highly collectible.

faqs.question: Does the tube add value?
faqs.answer: Yes. Original tubes add value for Springbank releases. Include photos of any original packaging.

faqs.question: Are older Springbank bottles valuable?
faqs.answer: Yes. Older and vintage Springbank bottlings, especially higher age statements and earlier bottlings, are often collectible.

faqs.question: How quickly will I receive an offer?
faqs.answer: We typically respond within one business day for Springbank submissions.

faqs.question: Do you buy Longrow Red releases?
faqs.answer: Yes. Longrow Red releases, finished in various wine casks, are collectible. Send photos and details.

faqs.question: What age statements are most valuable?
faqs.answer: Higher age statements generally command higher prices. The 18, 21, and 25 year expressions are particularly sought after.
